title: Vincenzo Esposito (footballer)
text: Vincenzo Esposito (born 5 February 1963) is an Italian <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="Coach%20%28sport%29">coach</a> and former player. He played as a <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a>. He is the manager of <a href="A.C.%20Prato">Prato</a>.
